name: Data Issue
about: Report issues with data collection or accuracy
title: '[DATA] '
labels: data, bug
assignees: ''
---

## Data Issue Type
- [ ] Missing data
- [ ] Incorrect data
- [ ] Data format issue
- [ ] API rate limit exceeded

## Description
Describe the data issue you encountered.

## Affected Date(s)
Which date(s) or time period is affected?
- Date: YYYY-MM-DD

## Expected Data
What data should have been collected?

## Actual Data
What data was actually collected (or missing)?

## Reproduction
How can this issue be reproduced?

## Impact
- [ ] High (No data collected)
- [ ] Medium (Partial data loss)
- [ ] Low (Minor inaccuracy)

## Additional Context
Add any relevant context, logs, or screenshots.
